result.title: No VK Cup 2018 announcement
result.content:
EDIT: It seems that CodeForces is hosting the VK Cup for Russian speakers only and not saying anything in English. This is not inclusive, at least there should be a message in English saying that it's Russian only...

We're less than a week from VK Cup 2018 first round and I haven't seen any announcement.

Even if it's because it's only for Russian speakers (I hope it's not), it would be good to have an announcement saying that so non-Russian speakers know that.

Also, if it's only for Russian speakers, are non-Russian speakers allowed to participate using an automatic translation tool (i.e. Google Translate) to translate problem statements?
